metadata.title: CVE-2017-12963 on Ubuntu 21.04 (hirsute) - low.
metadata.description: There is an illegal address access in Sass::Eval::operator() in eval.cpp of LibSass 3.4.5, leading to a remote denial of service attack. NOTE: this is similar to CVE-2017-11555 but remains exploitable after the vendor's CVE-2017-11555 fix (available from GitHub after 2017-07-24).

criterions.comment: libsass package in hirsute is affected and needs fixing.
